item.title: Forwards four repts re AOs in State of TX during 1982, including rupture of 2-Ci Cs-137 source during Dresser Atlas 821102 logging operations.Dresser Atlas application to renew State of TX License 8-446 encl.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, DKT 30 MTL BYPRODUCT, INCOMING CORRESPONDENCE, STATE/LOCAL GOVERNMENT TO NRC
item.author: TEXAS, STATE OF

item.title: Expresses pleasure in hosting mid-May visit NRC by Rex & accompanying delegation to hold general discussions & to sign renewal of info exchange & cooperation arrangement.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF GOVERNMENTAL and PUBLIC AFFAIRS (GPA)

item.title: Forwards check 1100 for $50.00.Fees not required for registration certificate for possession & use of small quantities of byproduct matl for in vitro testing.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR MATERIAL SAFETY and SAFEGUARDS (NMSS)

item.title: Agrees w/recommendations in SECY-90-382 re long-term use of waste encapsulation & storage facility sources at commercial irradiators.Commission should be apprised of noted steps. OIG should review file to ensure lessons learned addressed.
item.author: NRC COMMISSION (OCM)

item.title: Forwards results of recent BNL calculations of loss of feedwater & station blackout ATWS transients.Addl review expected to resolve conflicts w/B&W analyses.
